item.title: Impact of AI in Education Sector
item.description: The use of AI technology in education is rapidly growing, and chatbots like ChatGPT are becoming increasingly popular as tools to assist students with their homework and assignments. However, this trend has not been without controversy. Recently, it was reported that the state of New York has banned the use of chatbots like ChatGPT in schools, due to concerns about their potential misuse by students. The decision to ban chatbots in New York schools was made after it was reported that some students were using these tools to cheat on their homework and assignments.
